channel.title: Exploring IMT on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops

item.title: Exploring Kubernetes Cluster
item.description: The Kubernetes Navigator offers you two separate use cases to view your Kubernetes data. The K8s workloads is focusing on providing information in regards to workloads a.k.a. your deployments. The K8s nodes is focusing on providing insight into the performance of clusters, nodes, pods and containers.
